concept.title: Hello World!
concept.shortdesc: The pre-configured Couchbase environment provides two ways to quickly get experience using Couchbase: begin building an application or start building interactive queries.

section.title: Build An Application
section.p: Couchbase SDK supports all of the most popular programming languages.

p.b: Jump straight to using your favorite language:

section.p: Java - .NET - Node.js - Go - PHP - Python - C
Read the Developer's Intro to see how you can easily interact with documents through the command line.
When you are ready to dig into a full featured web application using Couchbase Server, check out the Couchbase Travel Sample Application.

section.title: Interactive Querying With N1QL
section.p: Use the built-in Query Workbench to immediately build SQL-like queries against JSON documents stored in Couchbase.
You can dig into using N1QL in other ways, see the N1QL Tutorial.
